item.description: I’m a software developer working in the financial industry in Stockholm, Sweden. I’m a big proponent of test driven development, although i try to avoid being dogmatic. I don’t think thereâ€™s one true way to develop software. Different styles suit different needs. Whether a given practice is appealing is highly subjective. For me, TDD really helps me in many of my everyday programming tasks. I will probably write a fair amount of posts about how I do TDD.
